timeline.bodyText:
I was noticing that adding a condition in this way isn't not calling the .withLastTransitionTime(iso8601Now()) which is called by all the StatusUtils method.
I was wondering if we should have a buildCondition as we have the buildWarningCondition passing just the type and it will set the status to "True" instead of passing again this constant.
